abstract: Out Here column; three months after a gas leak in residential garage exploded in Billings, Mont, rebuilding has finally begun.
snippet: Three months ago, a gas leak in a residential garage exploded ferociously in Billings, Mont., damaging or destroying at least 28 properties. Amazingly, no one was injured.
lead_paragraph: Three months ago, a gas leak in a residential garage exploded ferociously in Billings, Mont., damaging or destroying at least 28 properties. Amazingly, no one was injured.

headline.main: After a Gas Explosion, Cleaning Up and Feeling Lucky
headline.print_headline: After a Gas Explosion, Cleaning Up And Feeling Lucky
headline.seo: After a Gas Explosion in Billings, Mont., Cleaning Up and Feeling Lucky
